00028 //----------------------------------------------------------
00029 GrSkin::GrSkin( UReader& reader )
00030 : _name( "" )
00031 , _bindMesh( 0 )
00032 , _vertexWeights( 0 )
00033 , _vertexBoneIds( 0 )
00034 , _boneCount( 0 )
00035 , _boneNames( 0 )
00036 , _invBindMatrices( 0 )
00037 {
00038         Load( reader );
00039 }
00040 
00041 //----------------------------------------------------------
00042 GrSkin::GrSkin( const tstring& name, URef< GrMesh > bindMesh, const SVec3* vertexWeights, const unsigned int* vertexBoneIds,
00043                             const tstring* boneNames, const MMat4x4* invBindMatrices, unsigned int boneCount )
00044 : _name( name )
00045 , _bindMesh( bindMesh )
00046 , _vertexWeights( new SVec3[ bindMesh->GetVertexData()->GetVertexCount() ] )
00047 , _vertexBoneIds( new unsigned int[ bindMesh->GetVertexData()->GetVertexCount() ] )
00048 , _boneCount( boneCount )
00049 , _boneNames( new tstring[ boneCount ] )
00050 , _invBindMatrices( new MMat4x4[ boneCount ] )
00051 {
00053         B_ASSERT( _bindMesh->GetSkin() == 0 );
00054         memcpy( _vertexWeights, vertexWeights, _bindMesh->GetVertexData()->GetVertexCount() * sizeof( SVec3 ) );
00055         memcpy( _vertexBoneIds, vertexBoneIds, _bindMesh->GetVertexData()->GetVertexCount() * sizeof( unsigned int ) );
00056 
00058         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < boneCount; ++i )
00059         {
00060                 _boneNames[ i ] = boneNames[ i ];
00061                 _invBindMatrices[ i ] = invBindMatrices[ i ];
00062         }
00063 }
00064 
00065 //----------------------------------------------------------
00066 GrSkin::~GrSkin()
00067 {
00068         delete[] _boneNames;
00069         delete[] _invBindMatrices;
00070         delete[] _vertexWeights;
00071         delete[] _vertexBoneIds;
00072 }

00080 GrSkin*
00081 GrSkin::Clone( const tstring& name )
00082 {
00084         return new GrSkin( _name, _bindMesh, _vertexWeights, _vertexBoneIds, _boneNames, _invBindMatrices, _boneCount );
00085 }

00087 //----------------------------------------------------------
00088 GrSkin*
00089 GrSkin::CloneRange( const tstring& name, URef< GrMesh > bindMesh, unsigned int vertexStart, unsigned int vertexCount )
00090 {
00092         B_ASSERT( ( vertexStart + vertexCount ) <= _bindMesh->GetVertexData()->GetVertexCount() );
00093         B_ASSERT( vertexStart < _bindMesh->GetVertexData()->GetVertexCount() );
00094 
00097         B_ASSERT( vertexCount == bindMesh->GetVertexData()->GetVertexCount() );
00098 
00100         return new GrSkin( _name, bindMesh, _vertexWeights + vertexStart, _vertexBoneIds + vertexStart, _boneNames,
00101                 _invBindMatrices, _boneCount );
00102 }

00104 //----------------------------------------------------------
00105 unsigned int
00106 GrSkin::GetBoneId( const char* name ) const
00107 {
00109         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _boneCount; ++i )
00110         {
00111                 if ( strcmp( _boneNames[ i ].c_str(), name ) == 0 )
00112                         return i;
00113         }
00114 
00116         return ~0;
00117 }
00118 
00119 //----------------------------------------------------------
00120 const tstring&
00121 GrSkin::GetBoneName( unsigned int id ) const
00122 {
00123         B_ASSERT( id < GetBoneCount() );
00124         return _boneNames[ id ];
00125 }

00129 GrSkin::GetInvBindMatrix( unsigned int id ) const
00130 {
00131         B_ASSERT( id < _boneCount );
00132         return _invBindMatrices[ id ];
00133 }

00142 //----------------------------------------------------------
00143 void
00144 GrSkin::ReplaceVertexSkinData( SVec3* newWeights, unsigned int* newBoneIds )
00145 {
00146         delete[] _vertexWeights;
00147         delete[] _vertexBoneIds;
00148         _vertexWeights = newWeights;
00149         _vertexBoneIds = newBoneIds;
00150 }
00151 
00152 //----------------------------------------------------------
00153 void
00154 GrSkin::RemapVertexSkinData( unsigned short* remapping, unsigned int newCount, unsigned int prevCount )
00155 {
00156         SVec3* newVertexWeights = new SVec3[ newCount ];
00157         unsigned int* newVertexBoneIds = new unsigned int[ newCount ];
00158 
00160         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < prevCount; ++i )
00161         {
00162                 newVertexWeights[ remapping[ i ] ] = _vertexWeights[ i ];
00163                 newVertexBoneIds[ remapping[ i ] ] = _vertexBoneIds[ i ];
00164         }
00165 
00166         delete[] _vertexWeights;
00167         delete[] _vertexBoneIds;
00168         _vertexWeights = newVertexWeights;
00169         _vertexBoneIds = newVertexBoneIds;
00170 }

00172 //----------------------------------------------------------
00173 void
00174 GrSkin::Save( UWriter& writer ) const
00175 {
00177         writer.WriteUInt( *( ( unsigned int* )"SKIN" ) );
00178 
00180         writer.WriteString( _name );
00181 
00183         writer.WriteUInt( _boneCount );
00184         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _boneCount; ++i )
00185         {
00186                 writer.WriteString( _boneNames[ i ] );
00187                 _invBindMatrices[ i ].Save( writer );
00188         }
00189 
00191         _bindMesh->Save( writer );
00192 
00194         unsigned int vertexCount = _bindMesh->GetVertexData()->GetVertexCount();
00195         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i )
00196         {
00197                 writer.WriteUInt( _vertexBoneIds[ i ] );
00198                 writer.WriteFloat( _vertexWeights[ i ].x );
00199                 writer.WriteFloat( _vertexWeights[ i ].y );
00200                 writer.WriteFloat( _vertexWeights[ i ].z );
00201         }
00202 }

00204 //----------------------------------------------------------
00205 void
00206 GrSkin::Load( UReader& reader )
00207 {
00209         delete[] _vertexWeights;
00210         delete[] _vertexBoneIds;
00211         delete[] _boneNames;
00212         delete[] _invBindMatrices;
00213 
00215         unsigned int magic = reader.ReadUInt();
00216         B_ASSERT( strncmp( ( ( const char* )&magic ), "SKIN", 4 ) == 0 );
00217 
00219         _name = reader.ReadString();
00220 
00222         _boneCount = reader.ReadUInt();
00223         _boneNames = new tstring[ _boneCount ];
00224         _invBindMatrices = new MMat4x4[ _boneCount ];
00225         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _boneCount; ++i )
00226         {
00227                 _boneNames[ i ] = reader.ReadString();
00228                 _invBindMatrices[ i ].Load( reader );
00229         }
00230 
00232         _bindMesh = new GrMesh( reader );
00233 
00235         unsigned int vertexCount = _bindMesh->GetVertexData()->GetVertexCount();
00236         _vertexWeights = new SVec3[ vertexCount ];
00237         _vertexBoneIds = new unsigned int[ vertexCount ];
00238         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i )
00239         {
00240                 _vertexBoneIds[ i ] = reader.ReadUInt();
00241                 _vertexWeights[ i ].x = reader.ReadFloat();
00242                 _vertexWeights[ i ].y = reader.ReadFloat();
00243                 _vertexWeights[ i ].z = reader.ReadFloat();
00244         }
00245 }
